answers.answer: Yes...it's normal! Its your hormones and your skin does that. I promise. All the books I've read (which include "what to expect when you expecting" and "pregnancy week by week guide") say its normal and will go away a couple weeks after you have the baby.But call your doc if you are still worried! :)x
Mine got dark. Not black but darker. It was so gross but it goes away after birth!

question: When i went to take a shower i noticed that after i shaved that my armpits were really black....it looks really bad...i got tested for gestational diabetes and everything was fine but the last few days my armpits are getting blacker...oh by the way i am 26 weeks preg...if you have any answers please help..just incase i need to call the doc...thanks
title: black armpits.
